sentence.Network_en: Vivi : It must be the sashimi. They did not taste fresh enough.
sentence.Network_cn: 一定是那生鱼片, 他们尝起来不够新鲜!

sentence.Network_en: I tried both sushi and sashimi but I prefer sushi.
sentence.Network_cn: 寿司和生鱼片我都吃了,但是我更喜欢吃寿司.

sentence.Network_en: Kaiseki - ryori would not be complete without a serving of fresh sashimi.
sentence.Network_cn: 日本料理绝对不能没有新鲜的生鱼片.
